name: Goobli
description:
Goobli Slimo needs to find its way back to his island, but all the gooby bridges are gone! Maybe it can give away part of itself to rebuild them, but don't let it run out of energy because it's going to have to solve some puzzles in the meantime. Remind it to have it's veggies!

This was our submission for Ludum Dare 43: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/43/goobli

Controls:

WASD or arrows: Movement
E: Interact
R: Reset level
ESC: Exit game

Game by:
Bluelen
Shiul93:  https://soundcloud.com/luis-shiul93-llamas
                    https://github.com/Shiul93
